channel.title: Webclient stuck at title screen
channel.description:
Hey there!
I have used Ric's webclient tutorial [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,336494]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,336494[/url] and I did everything exactly like he did. Now, I have uploaded all my files to my webhost (000webhost).
It always gets stuck at "Requesting title screen", when I jarred and signed my client, in the tutorial it said I have to take out Sprites and cache while doing it, thats what I did, but now it does not find the title screen of the client. Help please?
antigex.host22.com to see the error it shows.

item.title: Webclient stuck at title screen
item.dc:creator: @oxygen1 oxygen-_
item.description:
@oxygen1 wrote:

Sigh…It means your client background is either too big, too small, or it isnt a recognized format…or maybe it isnt even in there

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient stuck at title screen
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

Make an auto-cache downloader following Kozs tutorial, its a good tut. After that, you have to jar your client and make a key for it. Not that hard tbh.

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient stuck at title screen
item.dc:creator: @Zosedan Zosedan
item.description:
@Zosedan wrote:

Well, it’s not even downloading the cache…

Read full topic
